nodes.text: Narl held the rank of colonel during the Galactic Civil War. His followers were mercenaries, sworn to keep trespassers away from the Jedi ruins on Mustafar.

Narl appeared as a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
